page.title: 15CORPORATION WASTE DISPOSAL
page.content: Situated in Abbey Lane, the layout includes: weighbridge, stores, materials lab, waste recycling and environmental/health units. The corporation tip takes in 1100 tons of domestic refuse per week from 135,000 household bins. Additionally, 3 civic dumping areas (where residents dump their own refuse) collect 43,500 tons of rubbish. There are also Bulk Collections (settees, fridges, etc.) which accumulate 14,500 tons of refuse. Trade waste is collected at the rate of 300 tons a week. The task of keeping Leicester clean is a mammoth one and one of the greatest innovations has been in recycling waste products-the bottle bank alone has returned 2.5 tons of material to the glass industry. 26 dustcarts serve the entire city.
